alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 7:29PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nueces and central Kleberg Counties through 800 PM CST... At 728 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Kingsville Naval Air Station, or 14 miles east of Kingsville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Bishop and Kingsville Naval Air Station. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 682 and 696. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces
